繵字的基本解释

繵
dàn
单衣。
束腰大带。

繵
tán
绳索。
紫色。

繵
chán
古同“缠”。

繵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tán］
［《集韻》唐干切，平寒，定。］
绳索。
[②]［chán］
［《集韻》澄延切，平，澄。］
同“纏1”。

繵字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　繵； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页941第04
【集韻】澄延切，音纏。【玉篇】繵謂之襌也。【揚子·方言】?繵謂之襌。【註】今又呼爲凉衣。　又【集韻】纏，亦作繵。【史記·扁鵲傳】動胃繵緣。【註】繵緣，謂脈纏繞胃也。　又【集韻】唐干切，音壇。繩也。一曰紫色。　又【廣韻】徒旱切，音但。束腰大帶。　又【集韻】黨旱切，音亶。束也。

繵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
繵字的起名意思

暂无。

繵
Basic explanation of words
繵
dàn
unlined garment.
Big waist belt.
繵
tán
rope.
purple.
繵
chán
Gu Tong "wrapped".
繵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tán］
["Ji Yun" Tang Qianqie, Ping Han, Ding. ]
rope.
[②]［chán］
["Ji Yun" Cheng Yan cut, flat , Cheng. ]
Same as "wrap 1".
繵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　繵; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 941 04
【Jiyun】Clear, extend and cut, with twisted sounds. [Jade articles] It is said that the naughty also. 【Yangtze Dialect】? It's the idiot. [Note] Today it is called Liangyi again.　[Jiyun] wrapped around, also made a scorpion. [Historical Records·Bian Que Biography] Stomach motility and fate 【Note】Yiyuan means that the pulse wraps around the stomach.　[Jiyun] Tang Qianqie, the music world. Rope also. One is purple.　[Guangyun] It’s only dry cut, but the sound is Dan. Big waist belt.　 [Ji Yun] The party is dry and the sound is dying. Beam also.
